usg: Use to set the types of files that the server accepts from the file upload input element. This is only a valid attribute if the type attribute value is set to 'file' for the element. Otherwise it will be ignored. One or more values can be specified that represent different content type specifiers.

vals.desc: Indicates that sound files are accepted
Indicates that image files are accepted
Indicates that video files are accepted

The text value can be a file extenstion starts with the STOP character ('.') eg: .doc, .gif, .jpg, .png, .pdf. Or a valid media type, with no parameters. A complete list of standard media types can be found here - IANA Media Types
